thread.title: At least 12 dead as Mali siege ends, some U.N. workers freed
thread.title_full: At least 12 dead as Mali siege ends, some U.N. workers freed

author: Expert
title: At least 12 dead as Mali siege ends, some U.N. workers freed
text:
Topnews , Worldnews Expert 
BAMAKO (Reuters) â€“ At least 12 people were killed during a nearly 24-hour siege of a hotel in central Mali seized by suspected Islamist gunmen that ended on Saturday as security forces stormed the building and released some of the United Nations workers trapped inside.
